programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.desc: Our most complete list yet of UK number 1s of the decade! Some songs just don't have videos, but 141 chart toppers do, and here they are - in order!

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: Torn Between Two Lovers! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Torn Between Two Lovers! Top 25
programme.desc: 25 beautiful breakup, sad & bitter-sweet love songs. With Gilbert O'Sullivan, Cliff Richard, Mary MacGregor, Leo Sayer & Elton John.

programme.title: Abba v Bee Gees: Love Songs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Abba v Bee Gees: Love Songs
programme.desc: 60 minutes of love songs from 2 of the biggest acts of the 70s - Abba & The Bee Gees.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 25 Silly Songs!
programme.desc: 2 hours of funny videos, silly songs & novelty hits - all of them amazing and all in the best possible taste!

programme.title: The Best 1972 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '72 including Bowie, Slade, The Sweet & The Osmonds. Don't forget your Ding-a-Ling!

programme.title: 50 Summer Sizzlers! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 of the very best feel-good summer hits. Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '70s - on the beach, on your transistor radio, and at the big Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: 70s Heatwave Hits!
programme.desc: Feelgood sunshine hits from the decade that gave us the summer of '76! T-Shirts & bikinis at the ready?

programme.title: 1970s Glastonbury Headliners!
programme.desc: Since the first festival in 1970, there were only another 2 in the decade - in 1971 & 1979. But these were the acts that headlined & performed, and one that didn't!

programme.title: 70s Heatwave Hits!
programme.desc: Feelgood sunshine hits from the decade that gave us the summer of '76! T-Shirts & bikinis at the ready?

programme.title: It Could Only Happen In The 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It Could Only Happen In The 70s!
programme.desc: Crazy fashions, dodgy dancing, ham-fisted flirting, chest hair, huge afros & Kojak in love - 25 videos that could only have come from the 70s! You wouldn't get away with it now!

programme.title: It's A MASSIVE 70s Party Night!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It's A MASSIVE 70s Party Night!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.
